title: Mertech to Showcase Evolution API Server Performance at API World 2015
text:
Mertech, a leading provider of database and API development tools, announced it will showcase the latest features of its Evolution API Server at API World 2015 being held September 29-30, 2015, at Santa Clara Convention Center, CA. Visitors to API World can learn about Evolution at Booth #314 or attend Mertech's presentation, "The Evolution of Desktop Apps - Cloudification with APIs," Wednesday, September 30, 2015, 2:00pm , Expo Stage B.
Pembroke Pines, FL (PRWEB) September 21, 2015
Evolution Now Simultaneously Serves Multiple Protocols from a Single Process Pool
Pembroke Pines, FL – September 21, 2015 -- Mertech, a leading provider of database and API development tools, announced it will showcase the latest features of its Evolution API Server at API World 2015 being held September 29-30, 2015, at Santa Clara Convention Center, CA. Visitors to API World can learn about Evolution at Booth #314 or attend Mertech's presentation, "The Evolution of Desktop Apps - Cloudification with APIs," Wednesday, September 30, 2015, 2:00pm , Expo Stage B.
Mertech Evolution API Server allows developers to expose desktop application functions as APIs then consume those APIs in different programming languages via multiple protocols including JSON-RPC, SOAP and Thrift binary. In its latest version, Evolution can now serve multiple protocols from a single process pool, tripling the maximum capacity of the server.
"We are excited to demonstrate Evolution's capabilities for the first time at API World," said Riaz Merchant, CEO of Mertech. “Evolution provides a powerful way to convert Windows desktop apps into a collection of API driven modules that can be accessed directly from programs developed in popular open source languages. These modules can then be deployed over any Cloud infrastructure. The flexibility to do this quickly has immense value for software companies looking to convert their desktop apps to the SaaS model.”
Mertech Evolution enables companies to:
Rapidly integrate existing desktop applications to the cloud Facilitate cross language development using Apache Thrift Convert existing function calls to APIs that can be served using HTTP or TCP Support JSON-RPC, SOAP, and binary protocols using the same codebase Easily test APIs using a built-in API testing framework Evolution development license is free and now available. Visit http://www.mertech.com for the free developer license or a trial version of the deployment server.
About Mertech
Mertech Data Systems, Inc. is a leading provider of API development tools, strategic application development services and database connectivity solutions for the SMB market. Mertech's products and services allow customers to adopt new technologies without sacrificing their investment in existing applications. Since founded in 1997, Mertech products and services are used by nearly 12,000 companies in 24 countries. Headquartered in Pembroke Pines, FL, Mertech maintains strategic partnerships with Oracle, Microsoft, and SAP. For more information, please visit http://www.mertech.com .
